mapper.insert: insert into table_books (book_title, book_author, book_publisher, book_price, book_description, book_regdate) values (#{title}, #{author}, #{publisher}, #{price}, #{description}, now())
mapper.select: select book_no as no, book_title as title, book_author as author, book_publisher as publisher, book_price as price, book_description as description, book_regdate as regdate from table_books
